title: Creating an Equation
text: If we let n be an odd number, then we know that $$n\left(n+2\right)=483$$. We can simplify this to get $$n^2+2n-483=0$$.

title: Solving the Equation
text: Using the quadratic formula, we get $$n=21, -23$$. We can remove the negative solution. So, the two consecutive odd numbers are 21 and 23.
